name: Your mom
description:
Join a mysterious internet cult in a visual novel that plays out like a real conversation happening within a chat app.

FEATURES:

  • Scheme and manipulate by applying your own social enginering skills against a variety of vibrant internet personalities

  • Uncover the mystery of a murderous internet mafia working within shadows to take over the world

  • Find your own alternative ways of resolving conflicts and obtaining useful informaion

  • Advance your coercion skills by making choices that fit the current situation best

  • Date the Moderator

  • Clowns.
